Question: ThunderSoft CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
ThunderSoft CES 2024

Rubik Large Language Model

- All-in-One Video Bar with 2 x 4K display and Pancake optical module
- Gesture with eye tracking and 6DoF tracking / 6DoF Controller
- 2 x RGB Camera Video see through

RazorDCX Tarkine

- New generation MP Cockpit-Driving Fusion domain control solution
- Plenty of external interfaces and functions
- Extreme high cost-effectiveness
- Computing power scheduling mechanism and real-time communication of one SOC
- High-level Functional Safety
